reviews.text: Everything here was absolutely delicious. We got the Greek salad, Venetian pizza, and doughnut balls and would absolutely get any of them again. So glad we found this gem!
Food was absolutely amazing and the service was spectacular and fast and the waiters are very very nice. I will definitely go there again.
Lost the love man. Maybe back in the day was good. Just not there anymore.
The food is awesome
Clean, welcoming place with attentive service

Nice convenient kosher restaurant. We went to meet with our friends in the evening for deserts only (had a big lunch at another restaurant earlier in the day). Nice small place, pleasant atmosphere (inside, not outside), very good service and delicious desserts. Everything was good, happy! I recommend this restaurant and next time will try their food. Thank you!

Crown Heights Mozzarella is my go-to spot for Kosher restaurant dairy and fish. Their salmon dish is absolutely delicious,  perfectly cooked and flavorful every time. On top of that, the service is friendly and attentive, which makes the whole experience even better. Highly recommend..
Worth the price tag very good food and great service and a little play area for little kids

This place is great,
The service is amazing, and the food is delicious!!!

Food is nasty.
Service is nowhere to be found.
Was there in the afternoon. Nice place. Food was good. Service nice. Looking forward for next time
I was not impressed at all

Great customer service! We went there for lunch with my family. Ordered individual pizza for the kids-  was super yummy and crunchy. I had the fish - portion sizes are kinda small. It came with 2 sides. I got the fried mushrooms and fries. Also got a salad. Andy our waiter was super attentive. I think for their prices their portions can be bigger. But the food was tasty. We also had limonana and cheesecake that we enjoyed. Great kosher option in crown heights if you want dairy.
People need to understand Kosher Food is more expensive. The portions are disgusting in size for the price. As a very reformed Jew, I rather eat at a non kosher place.
Great food. Loved the cauliflower, mozzarella sticks and deserts.

I hosted my mother's 90th birthday lunch here.  Luis was very knowledgeable and helpful in helping me organize the event.  On the day of the staff were all incredibly attentive and the food was great.  The only snag was that the party room was unavailable due to construction.   I highly recommend it.

Excellent kosher dairy restaurant. Open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Pizza, pasta, and fish dinners. The Sea Bass is delicious. The fettuccine is ideal. Lots of choices for dessert and for creamy hot chocolate or coffee.
Average food very overpriced for the portion served. I wouldnâ€™t particularly recommend

Mozzarella is a great spot if youâ€™re looking for quality food and excellent service. I had the salmon, and it was cooked perfectlyâ€”moist, flavorful, and nicely plated. The staff was friendly and attentive throughout the meal, making the whole experience really enjoyable. Definitely a place Iâ€™d recommend and return to!

Beautiful place, Lovely ambience, Calm vibe.  Menu diverse enough for many different tastes and moods. Staff very friendly and helpful, and food was delicious and beautifully plated.
Highly recommend. I always end up going there when I come into Crown Heights.
Great place! delicious food! ziti and ravioli were yummy! highly recommend!

Great food, good service, good vibe!
Highly recommended

I was there a little over a year ago. I arrived with a friend at lunchtime. There were maybe 5-6 people in the restaurant. The food took a long time to come out and when it arrived, the flavors were unbalanced. We ordered the pesto pasta, which was not cooked to the right degree and the sauce was unbalanced. The pizza dough was not of high quality and the sauce did not live up to expectations. There was no atmosphere or music in the background. I heard every word the workers said in the kitchen and the waiters. Regarding the price, the price was not terrible and was very reasonable. I have heard good things about the place lately, that it has changed and the food is excellent. Maybe I will give it another chance and update the review.

Crown Heights Mozzarella is a gem. I started with the lentil soup, which was rich, hearty, and perfectly seasonedâ€”comforting without being heavy. Then came the Firenza Fettuccine, which was on another level. The pasta was cooked to perfection, coated in a velvety, well-balanced sauce that had just the right depth of flavor. Every bite felt indulgent but refined. The quality here speaks for itself. Highly recommend.

Luis my server was beyond amazing always smiling and helpful to us he made our experience all that much better .
Average quality food. Ordered pizza and soup of the day. The tomato sauce did not seem fresh and the cheese was chewy.
Whenever I donâ€™t have time to prepare a lunch from work, I order a pickup order on the Mozzarella website and itâ€™s so easy, and food is always great
JosÃ© was an excellent waiter with friendly and courteous service!
Little bit overpriced,but we enjoyed â™¥ï¸
The dishes were delicious, complex and creative, truly delightful. The staff was attentive, helpful and friendly. Highest recommendation!
Nice Vibe! Very good dairy restaurant!!
Great place for a coffee or a meal. Everything on the menu is delicious. Service is excellent

I went there for a business meeting and this place did not disappoint.
It was perfect and amazing for what I needed it.
Emanuel greeted us right away when we walked in, we chose to sit in the back room,
We were seated with the menu right away,
The temperature there was perfect, and the music volume was just perfect
After we chose our food from the menu we ordered
Emanuel remembered exactly what we ordered with no mishaps in the order what so ever
And then the food came, and I was truly blown away by the taste. It was just mouth-watering delicious!
All around, it was truly an amazing experience, and I would highly recommend it for personal, business, or just a simple family gathering or party.

Had BH an amazing experience looking fwd to go again, food was delicious service was amazing kudos for Mozzarella

ps. think the portions are relatively small

mozzarella sticks- CHEESE WAS NOT MELTED
TINY PORTIONS AND PRICE IS INSANE
pizza was so cheesy and oily
fries are only good thing.

Que suerte haber encontrado este lugar en nuestro primer viaje a NY, es una joya escondida, pasas de frente y no te imaginas lo que hay adentro pues la puerta de entrada no es muy llamativa pero creeme que vale demasiado la pena, la atenciÃ³n es un 10 de 10, la comida una calidad en sabores y una presentaciÃ³n visual que si emociona, disfrutamos cada bocado y las bebidas fueron exquisitas, un ambiente familiar, el lugar es elegante y acogedor , ame la decoraciÃ³n, mi mamÃ¡ les mencionÃ³ que al dÃ­a siguiente serÃ­a mi cumpleaÃ±os y me dieron un detalle, gracias por hacer mi viaje mÃ¡s especial â¤ï¸

B.H.
Manuel & all the staff are phenomenal!!!
Food terrific!!!
The food was yum, the service was good.

We had a great experience at Mozzarella! If you're in Crown Heights and craving an exceptional dining experience, Mozzarella Restaurant is a must-visit. The service is outstanding, with Manuel and Eddie going above and beyond to ensure every guest feels welcomed and well-cared-for. Their attentiveness and friendly demeanor truly enhance the dining experience.

The food is equally impressive, with the La Vanetian pizza standing out as a must-try. The crust is perfectly crisp, and the toppings are fresh and flavorful, making each bite a delight.

The atmosphere at Mozzarella is warm and inviting, making it an ideal spot for both friends and family gatherings. Whether you're looking for a casual night out or a place to celebrate a special occasion, Mozzarella Restaurant offers a combination of excellent service, delicious food, and a pleasant ambiance.
Good was delicious,  service was excellent and pricing was good. It was a great experience!

First time visiting Mozzarella and we will be back iyh. The staff were friendly and attentive, the food was delicious and came out quickly, and when I accidentally double tipped, the server brought it up immediately and offered to refund it. THAT was impressive.

Came in on Tuesday brunch time. Very nice ambiance, plenty of seating. Soft background music. Came with 2 friends and ordered appetizers and entrees. All delicious food. $$$ a bit pricey. Waiter service. Look at my photos.
Came here for a friends birthday. Very nice atmosphere with great service. The food was ready extremely quickly and most importantly, very tasty!!!

Update 2022:
Love the new mushroom ravioli, itâ€™s so so good. Other items I recommend are the signature cigar rolls, the lox pizza, the breaded mushroom appetizer and any or all of their drinks!

â€”â€”â€”
The breaded mushroom app is my favorite. The salmon was cooked to perfection.

This place is amazing, the food is fresh and arrives quickly and most importantly it is delicious, courteous service and the prices are affordable.
good job .

This place has just gotten obnoxious. When they 1st opened portions were generous and fresh. I ordered breakfast, salad eggs, and potatoes. There were four 3 days old potato wedges....while everyone in our group got their food within 15 min of ordering, a plain panini took over 30 minutes to come we also put in an order with the panini for a plain breakfast..when I asked the staff where it is I was told I need to be patient and it takes time..meanwhile my brother ordered another breakfast amd it came out within 10 min....still waiting for the plain breakfast...at this point it was getting ridiculous and keep in mind he assured me he was gonna check on it...he did nothing. After 40 min, my brother asked what's going on, and the same waiter who assured me I had to wait patiently said, "Oh actually, I never put it in the order!! He couldn't even come over to me too, sorry. It just shows how far down this place has gone. I would not go back here, nothing special except yesterday's food.

A good dairy eatery in Crown Heights.
The place is big, has a great vibe, and the staff are plentiful. Nonetheless, at times this place gets busy and doesn't run smoothly.
The food is delicious and is spiced well and the drinks are good.
Make sure you get what you order as they tend to mix it up a lot. The food can come cold...
Come here when it's not busy and it will be amazing.

I have very mixed feelings about this restaurant. The vibe is pretty cool, especially the back room, and for someone looking to get out of Flatbush, Crown Heights is ideal. Now let's get to the food. As the meal began, I was very impressed with most of the appetizers, but as more food came out and especially the mains, it was a little disappointing. We were a group of six, so we ordered plenty of different dishes so I got to taste almost the entire menu. The mozzarella sticks are really good. The shawarma tacos are interesting, but very enjoyable if you like middle Eastern food. The stuffed mushrooms were tasty but the portion was tiny. The cheese rice balls were delicious. Now for the mains... First off, we ordered two identical dishes of grilled salmon. One portion was absolutely stellar; cooked perfectly, and really high quality fish. The other one was dry and rubbery which was a real disappointment. The Chilean sea bass was excellent but quite small for a piece of fish that's $45. The seared tuna steak was just okay. Nothing great or memorable. And as my friend at AT&T likes to say "Just ok is NOT okay". ;) The truffle fries were delicious, as were the truffle mashed potatoes. As far as pasta goes, the fettuccine alfredo was excellent, however, the penne Rosa was terrible; really bland. We also had a vegetable pizza which was pretty good, but the pesto pizza was really not too impressive. The pesto was just drenched all over the pizza, and really ruined the texture, and made it all soggy and runny. We ordered an eggplant parmesan, but one of us took one bite and really didn't enjoy it, and it just sat there and we just left it untouched. It could be it was okay but we're just not eggplant parmesan people. We ordered it because it came highly recommended. As far as desserts go, the cheesecake is good, and the peanut butter souffle is great, but a little intense in terms of flavor. Very heavy on the peanut butter. The waffle is pretty good, but the crÃ¨me brÃ»lÃ©e was absolutely abysmal. I personally enjoy crÃ¨me brÃ»lÃ©e warm, but this one is cold, but that's just my personal preference. However the top was nearly inedible. It was just burnt crust that you couldn't really break. The milkshakes and coffee drinks are decent, but nothing to write home about. The plating and food design for all the dishes were stellar though. Overall, we had a nice time, some of the dishes were big hits, and others were big misses. It's definitely an expensive restaurant, so it was a little bit of a letdown but we still left pretty happy. We spent a little over $500 bucks for 5 adults and 1 child which in my opinion is definitely not "cheap" for a dairy restaurant, so I was sort of hoping for a little bit more of the "wow" factor. But, it's quite hard to get everything perfect, and and they got a lot right. The food came out swiftly, and the service was very good too. Attached below are photos of most of the dishes we ordered.

Letâ€™s start by saying it was just amazing !!!
The food was so good and plated so nicely, service was beyond such nice waiters.â€¦

Great place to come for brunch; they have a cute outdoor sun room in the back, situated on a deck. Order a few dishes to split with friends! Appetizers run a bit expensive for what they are -  good size portions for the main courses though!

I ordered take out for a friend that just had a baby and this was the response from them.
New dad â€œThis food is delish! Best kosher delivery Iâ€™ve had!â€
New mom â€œIâ€™m so happy right nowâ€ â€œEvery dish is deliciousâ€
Needless to say I think this restaurant is a hit!   I ordered a mix of dairy and parve dishes and everyone loved it.
They were also really pleasant to deal with on the phone.  Canâ€™t wait to visit them in person.
Great food, vibe and ambience. Ask for a table in the back room, itâ€™s nicer and more chill than the front. Our waiter was excellent.
Love the ambiance and the food was great!!  Staff were very accommodating and food came out quick.

Great menu and perfect for a full family sit down or just a quick bite. Amazing coffee too.
Also one of the few kosher places around here where you can look forward to being treated as a human not an ATM.

Great food at reasonable prices. Enjoyed the smoked salmon egg sandwich (pictured).

Even the home fries were amazing, tasty and crunchy. They were still great after I brought them home hours later!

Nice ambiance, and friendly staff.

Service wasn't the best though it was Thanksgiving so extremely busy. Fancy hot chocolate was good, latte and pumpkin spice latte was not good and served warm not hot. Don't but the stuffed mushrooms it comes with 3 tiny mushrooms. Pizza was good nothing special shakshuka was hit or miss.
Delicious food, excellent friendly service, varied menu w large tasty portions.
This place got WAY better over the past year! Pizza and salads were great. Service is fantastic. Beautiful party room too.
Great food, and excellent service, but takes a little long for them to check you out and payâ€¦

Great place!
A unique chef restaurant with very tasty dishes.
I'll be back again soon :)
Pizza is really really small. The bread is very doughy type of crust, while the sauce and cheese was pretty decent. The fries were the better item, and were enjoyable.
Food was great and service was top notch!
Nice place in Brooklyn, 2 blocks from subway. Love the service and friendly staff. Food is good. Pizza size is a bit small, but still tasty.
Amazing dairy restaurant! Food is flavorful and beautifully presented. Highly recommend!
Delicious food, courteous wait staff, great ambiance. Overall great experience. Would go back again!
Food is fresh, flavorful and very nice size portions! Loved everything!
Awesome friendly service, beautiful place. I'll definitely come back again. Thanks, guys!

Loved it! Delicious food, friendly stuff, classy place.
P.S. cigars (don't remember full name of the dish) are best I ever had!!
Amazing food wonderful ambience the food is top notch
